Set.Text: The Textile Mill is an English unique building that increases the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of a city. Unlike the Windmill it replaces, the Textile Mill can be built in any city. It also generates additional [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_RES_COTTON] Cotton, [ICON_RES_DYE] Dyes, and [ICON_RES_SILK] Silk resources, and will create a [ICON_RES_COTTON] Cotton resource nearby this City when constructed, if possible.

+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_RES_COTTON] Cotton, [ICON_RES_DYE] Dyes, and [ICON_RES_SILK] Silk resources worked by this City. Plants a [ICON_RES_COTTON] Cotton resource nearby this City when constructed, if possible.
